name: Splash Adventure: The Maze of Morla
description: Help "Floti Tank" getting the WAIFU LOVE he deserves succeeding the deadly maze of "Morla". Immerse in a Splash Adventure full of action and BIKINIS. WAIFU AYUMI will be watching and reacting to your performance ~Nya~.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or higher. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Geforce 9500GT, Radeon HD 3650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1024 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
